name: Mashed Potatoes
steps: Peel and cut potatoes into 1-inch pieces.
Combine potatoes, 2 tsp salt, and enough water to cover in a large pot. Cover and bring to a boil over high heat.
Once boiling, reduce to medium heat and simmer, uncovered, until fork-tender, 12-14 minutes.
Meanwhile, thinly slice chives and set aside.
Once potatoes are fork-tender, drain and remove from heat. Mash in sour cream, butter, and chives until smooth. Season with salt and pepper.
